title: Profile
privateProfileDescription: Having a private profile means other users need to request to follow you. Only if you accept their follow request, will they be able to see your workouts
hideSuggestedUsersDescription: Enabling this will remove the suggested user section from your feed
defaultWorkoutVisibilityDescription: Set the default workout visibility for new workouts. You can change it for specific workouts when saving them. It does not affect existing workouts retroactively
everyoneDescription: Workouts will be visible to all users on GymLog
privateDescription: Workouts will only be visible to you
